page.title: 12DORRINGTON TALES
page.content:
One day our class went for a walk to Dorrington which is the place where my dad used to live.The night before we went he told me the story of the church.In one of the gardens at Dorrington there is a stone monument.It is said the stone was left there to show where the church used to be.The fairies were supposed to have moved the church in the night to the top of the hill next to the main road.Nobody can prove it isn't true but nobody can prove it's true either. There are many stories made up by villagers. By Joanna Blow - age 11
THE DEVIL THROUGH THE KEY-HOLE. It is said that if you run round Dorrington Church twice,starting dead on midnight and then look through the key-hole you can see the devil. By JEREMY HODSON - age 11
